quizQuestions.Question: Why is it important to re-evaluate your plan every so often?
findAnswer: a) So that you can spend more money.
b) Situations change and you need to be sure your needs are met.

quizQuestions.Question: Why is it important to re-evaluate stock portfolio?
findAnswer: a) So that you can make more money.

quizQuestions.Question: Why is it important to give Jena money so often?
findAnswer: a) So that she can spend more money.
b) Situations change and you need to be sure your needs are met.
